title: Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'onDidChangeStatuses' of null
body:
[Enter steps to reproduce below:]

1. ...
2. ...

**Atom Version**: 1.13.0
**Electron Version**: 1.3.13
**System**: Mac OS X 10.12.1
**Thrown From**: [achieve-atom](https://github.com/nsamarin/stacs-hack) package, v0.7.0


### Stack Trace

Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'onDidChangeStatuses' of null

```
At /Users/yaroslavgraboveckiy/.atom/packages/achieve-atom/lib/commit-achievement.coffee:54

TypeError: Cannot read property 'onDidChangeStatuses' of null
    at CommitAchievement.module.exports.CommitAchievement.register (/Users/yaroslavgraboveckiy/.atom/packages/achieve-atom/lib/commit-achievement.coffee:54:24)
    at Object.toggle (/Users/yaroslavgraboveckiy/.atom/packages/achieve-atom/lib/stacs-hack.coffee:76:24)
    at atom-workspace.subscriptions.add.atom.commands.add.stacs-hack:toggle (/Users/yaroslavgraboveckiy/.atom/packages/achieve-atom/lib/stacs-hack.coffee:25:85)
    at CommandRegistry.module.exports.CommandRegistry.handleCommandEvent (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar/src/command-registry.js:259:29)
    at CommandRegistry.handleCommandEvent (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar/src/command-registry.js:3:59)
    at CommandRegistry.module.exports.CommandRegistry.dispatch (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar/src/command-registry.js:160:19)
    at AtomEnvironment.module.exports.AtomEnvironment.dispatchContextMenuCommand (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar/src/atom-environment.js:1181:28)
    at EventEmitter.outerCallback (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar/src/application-delegate.js:332:25)
    at emitThree (events.js:116:13)
    at EventEmitter.emit (events.js:194:7)
```

### Commands

```
  2x -0:25.3.0 core:backspace (input.hidden-input)
     -0:23.2.0 core:save (input.hidden-input)
     -0:03.5.0 stacs-hack:toggle (div.lines)
```

### Config

```json
{
  "core": {
    "disabledPackages": [
      "git-time-machine",
      "language-gfm"
    ],
    "packagesWithKeymapsDisabled": [],
    "telemetryConsent": "limited",
    "themes": [
      "atom-dark-ui",
      "one-o-eight-syntax"
    ]
  }
}
```
